Articles.Content: Is there any mods that add Robocraft parts in KSP? Please let me know. Thank you and have a nice day.

Moving to General Add-on Affairs, as that's the appropriate subforum for mod requests ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) (Also tweaked the title to be a bit more specific, since if we had tons of threads labeled just things like "Mod Request," things would get just a little confusing.)

I'm not sure if this is exactly what you're asking for, but [Infernal Robotics](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37707-0-90-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Infernal-Robotics-0-19-3?highlight=infernal+robotics) seems to be the go-to mod for making anything with lots of complex moving parts.
